topic.title: Add Nodes via REST API
topic.shortdesc: With the REST API, you can add nodes to the cluster by providing the IP address, administrator username, and password as part of the data payload.

body.p: Use the curl command to add a new node. If you are adding another service than data, which is the default, specify that service index or n1ql: > curl -u cluster-username:cluster-password localhost:8091/controller/addNode\ -d "hostname=192.168.0.68&user=node-username&password=node-password&services=n1ql"
